title: Integrate bd CLI with AgentiCorp beads system
description: Clarified distinction between bd CLI (for development work on AgentiCorp) and AgentiCorp beads (for agent work items). Updated AGENTS.md to document both systems and when to use each.

title: Integrate gitops manager with AgentiCorp initialization
description:
The gitops.Manager package is now created but not yet integrated into AgentiCorp's initialization flow. Need to:
- Initialize gitops.Manager in agenticorp.Initialize()  
- Clone/pull projects on startup for sticky projects
- Integrate LoadBeadsFromProject with existing bead loading
- Add API endpoints for git operations (sync, commit, push)
- Add git credential management via keymanager
- Add UI controls for project git operations
- Document git workflow for project management

title: Add documentation rule enforcement to CI/CD
description:
Added documentation structure enforcement:
- Created scripts/check-docs-structure.sh to validate doc layout
- Added lint-docs target to Makefile
- Added GitHub Actions workflow (lint-docs-structure.yml)
- Enforces: docs go in docs/, planning files in plans/, only entry points in root
